reviewText: This is the PAL version as a Region 1 version is not available in the United States.  Simply make a small change in your computer and it plays just fine.
Hilarious DVD. Forgot it was coming from UK so it will not play on my DVD player but will play through my laptop.
Brilliantlywritten, directed and performed. A satirical romp.
Love it.  Not for everyone....for sure.  But for me....I think it's great.
it was ok  not what it
An extremely fine Composer, Singers, Librettist and Orchestra give a great rendering of this funny tragedy of 21st century life.
